contents.content: 第三部分 三种句子类型
第三章 主从复合句
第七节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析60例
（一）主语从句
Example 1
真题回放：From a detailed analysis of the salamanders' family tree, however, it is clear that the other lineages evolved from an ancestor that itself had lost the ability to metamorphose. （剑10阅读）

contents.title: 我们保护一种正在消亡的语言，就是在保护文化的多样性；我们失去一种语言，就是失去一种文化遗产。
contents.answer: ：When we preserve a language which is dying out, we preserve the cultural diversity; when we lose a language, we lose a cultural heritage.

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。it是形式主语，第一个that引导的是主语从句；该从句中又包含一个由that引导的定语从句，修饰an ancestor。
Example 2
真题回放：What is still not fully understood, however, is why some trees resort to producing red pigments while others don't bother, and simply reveal their orange or yellow hues. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。What引导的是主语从句；why引导的是表语从句，该表语从句又是由while连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，while前后的句子是对比关系。
Example 3

真题回放：In fact it is now a requirement for anyone hoping to get permission to do research that they consult the communities, who are helping to set the research agenda to reflect their most important concerns. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句；该从句中又包含一个由who引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰the communities。
Example 4
真题回放：From this evidence it was deduced that there had been three major waves of migration across the Bering Strait. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
Example 5
真题回放：It was found that children from the noisy schools had higher blood pressure and were more easily distracted than those who attended the quiet schools. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句；该从句中又包含一个由who引导的定语从句，修饰those。
Example 6
真题回放：This happens to such a high degree in some children that they appear to be demonstrating talent in particular areas. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，such…that引导的是结果状语从句。
Example 7
真题回放：Thus, when Hofmann made some passing comments about the desirability of a synthetic substitute for quinine, it was unsurprising that his star pupil was moved to take up the challenge. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。when引导的是时间状语从句；it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
Example 8

真题回放：In the mythology of giftedness, it is popularly believed that if people are talented in one area, they must be defective in another, that intellectuals are impractical, that prodigies burn too brightly too soon and burn out, that gifted people are eccentric, that they are physical weaklings, that there's a thin line between genius and madness, that genius runs in families, that the gifted are so clever they don't need special help, that giftedness is the same as having a high IQ, that some races are more intelligent or musical or mathematical than others, that genius goes unrecognised and unrewarded, that adversity makes men wise or that people with gifts have a responsibility to use them. （剑8阅读）

语法破解：这是个超长的句子，有116个单词，但对句子结构进行拆分之后，意思就很好理解了。这是一个多重主从复合句，it是形式主语，13个that引导的都是主语从句，这13个句子是同等关系。第一个that引导的主语从句中又包含一个由if引导的条件状语从句。在that the gifted are so clever they don't need special help中，又包含一个由so…（that已省略）引导的结果状语从句。
Example 9
真题回放：How and where man learnt how to produce flame at will is unknown. （剑1阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。How and where引导的是主语从句。
Example 10

真题回放：Looking back, it now seems quite incredible that in the national health systems that emerged in many countries in the years immediately after the 1939-45 World War, it was assumed without question that all the basic health needs of any community could be satisfied, at least in principle; the ‘invisible hand' of economic progress would provide. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句，第一个it是形式主语，第一个that引导的是主语从句。该主语从句本身又是一个主从复合句，画线的部分是由that引导的定语从句，修饰the national health systems；后面的it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句，该主语从句又是由分号连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。
（二）宾语从句
Example 1
真题回放：Positive psychologists have identified 24 qualities we admire, such as loyalty and kindness, and are studying them to find out why they come so naturally to some people. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。we admire 是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰24 qualities；why引导的是宾语从句，作find out的宾语。
Example 2

真题回放：We are pleased that the current state administration has been very proactive in its support of us, and has come through with budgetary support of the infrastructure needs we have long sought. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词pleased的宾语；该从句中的we have long sought是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰budgetary support。
Example 3
真题回放：Others, however, point out that the first weather stations in the far north date back just 50 years. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作point out的宾语。
Example 4
真题回放：MIRTP focused on what would be most appropriate for the inhabitants of Makete in terms of what was available, how much they could afford and what they were willing to accept. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个what引导的是宾语从句，作介词on的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含由what, how much, what引导的三个同等关系的宾语从句，作介词短语in terms of的宾语。
Example 5
真题回放：Perkin quickly grasped that his purple solution could be used to colour fabric, thus making it the world's first synthetic dye. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词grasped的宾语。
Example 6
真题回放：However, there are other reasons for being interested in whether life exists elsewhere. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。whether引导的是宾语从句，作介词in的宾语。
Example 7
真题回放：The mere existence of such a civilisation will tell us that long-term survival is possible, and gives us some cause for optimism.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词tell的直接宾语。
Example 8

真题回放：He might not be surprised that science has confirmed Echinacea's role as a treatment for wounds, or that it has been found to be helpful in relieving arthritis, both claims Meyer made for the herb.
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。两个that引导的是选择关系的宾语从句，作形容词surprised的宾语；Meyer made for the herb是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰both claims。
Example 9
真题回放：We have to test a number of blade types to avoid this happening or at least make sure it does not damage the turbines or reduce performance.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。画线的部分是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，作make sure的宾语。
Example 10
真题回放：You might wonder how we can tell whether fossil animals lived on land or in water, especially if only fragments are found. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。how引导的是宾语从句，作动词wonder的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含一个由whether引导的宾语从句和一个由if引导的条件状语从句。
（三）表语从句
Example 1
真题回放：A fundamental difference between paintings and other art forms is that there is no prescribed time over which a painting is viewed. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是表语从句；该表语从句中又包含一个由over which引导的定语从句，修饰prescribed time。
Example 2

真题回放：One possibility is that these traits are lost and then simply reappear, in much the same way that similar structures can independently arise in unrelated species, such as the dorsal fins of sharks and killer whales. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是表语从句；该表语从句中又包含一个由that引导的是同位语从句，作way的同位语。
Example 3
真题回放：Other unanswered questions are whether the nose is the only part of the body affected by odours, and how smells can be measured objectively given the non-physical components. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。whether和how引导的都是表语从句；这两个表语从句由and连接，是同等关系。
Example 4
真题回放：This is because they, and only they, can change the reflection in the mirror. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，because引导的是表语从句。
Example 5
真题回放：The immediate question was whether it should be done at all. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，whether引导的是表语从句。
Example 6
真题回放：A popular explanation of play has been that it helps juveniles develop the skills they will need to hunt, mate and socialise as adults. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是表语从句；该从句中的they will need to hunt, mate and socialise as adults又是一个省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰the skills。
Example 7
真题回放：It may seem that this cultural continuity gives us a huge advantage over ants. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。seem是半系动词，that引导的是表语从句。
Example 8
真题回放：Nobody knows the Arctic as well as the locals, which is why they are not content simply to stand back and let outside experts tell them what's happening. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。which引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰前面的整个句子；该定语从句中又包含一个由why引导的表语从句，该表语从句中又包含一个由what引导的宾语从句。
Example 9
真题回放：The most basic form of information, Shannon argued, is whether something is true or false—which can be captured in the binary unit, or ‘bit’, of the form 1 or 0. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。whether引导的是表语从句；该从句中又包含一个由which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰true or false。Shannon argued是插入语。
Example 10
真题回放：The latest beliefs are that the main purposes of sleep are to enable the body to rest and replenish, allowing time for repairs to take place and for tissue to be regenerated. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。
（四）同位语从句
Example 1

真题回放：The fact that people go to the Louvre museum in Paris to see the original painting Mona Lisa when they can see a reproduction anywhere leads us to question some assumptions about the role of museums of fine art in today's world. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。画线的部分是主句；that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语；该从句中又包含一个由when引导的时间状语从句。
Example 2

真题回放：This might be explained by the fact that the novel has evolved precisely because of technological developments that made it possible to print out huge numbers of texts, whereas oil paintings have always been produced as unique objects. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语。在这个同位语从句中，whereas前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是定语从句，修饰technological developments；whereas后是一个简单句；whereas前后的句子是对比关系。
Example 3

真题回放：Despite popular belief that sleep is one long event, research shows that, in an average night, there are five stages of sleep and four cycles, during which the sequence of stages is repeated. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是同位语从句，作belief的同位语；第二个that引导的是宾语从句，作动词shows的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含一个由during which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰four cycles。
Example 4
真题回放：In other words, we became aware of the obvious fact that there were ‘limits to growth’. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语。
Example 5

真题回放：There is no evidence that Echinacea is effective against snakebite, but Dr Meyer—who genuinely believed in Echinacea—would probably be quite amused if he could come back and see the uses to which modern science has put ‘his’ herb. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：but前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是同位语从句，作evidence的同位语。but后一个多重主从复合句，画线的部分是主句，who引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰Dr Meyer；if引导的是条件状语从句；该从句中又包含一个由to which引导的定语从句，修饰the uses。but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 6
真题回放：There is evidence that all modern turtles are descended from a terrestrial ancestor which lived before most of the dinosaurs. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作evidence的同位语；该从句中又包含一个由which引导的定语从句，修饰a terrestrial ancestor。
Example 7

真题回放：The results of the study lend support to the World Bank's recommendation that education budgets in developing countries should be increased, not just to help their economics, but also to improve child healthcare. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作recommendation的同位语。
Example 8
真题回放：Plato expressed the idea that humour is simply a delighted feeling of superiority over others. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是同位语从句，作idea的同位语。
Example 9

真题回放：Sceptics and advocates alike do concur on one issue, however: that the most impressive evidence so far has come from the so-called ‘ganzfeld’ experiments, a German term that means ‘whole field’. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是同位语从句，作one issue的同位语；a German term是ganzfeld的同位语；第二个that引导的是定语从句，修饰a German term。
Example 10
真题回放：The picture is made more complicated by the fact that these crystals occur in batches. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语。
（五）定语从句
Example 1
真题回放：There are, nevertheless, people working in luxurious, state-of-the-art centres designed to stimulate innovation who find that their environment doesn't make them feel at all creative. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。who引导的是定语从句，修饰people；该从句中又包含一个由that引导的宾语从句，作find的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：One explanation for the trend to more superhot fires is that the region, which usually has dry summers, has had significantly below normal precipitation in many recent years. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是表语从句；该从句中又包含一个由which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰the region。
Example 3
真题回放：On the other hand, dams, aqueducts and other kinds of infrastructure will still have to be built, particularly in developing countries where basic human needs have not been met. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。where引导的是定语从句，修饰developing countries。
Example 4
真题回放：Those speeches fired the young chemist's enthusiasm further, and he later went on to attend the Royal College of Chemistry, which he succeeded in entering in 1853, at the age of 15. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：and前是一个简单句。and后是一个主从复合句；which引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰the Royal College of Chemistry。and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 5
真题回放：Some of the senses that we and other terrestrial mammals take for granted are either reduced or absent in cetaceans or fail to function well in water. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是定语从句，修饰the senses。
Example 6
真题回放：There are examples of languages that have survived in written form and then been revived by latter generations. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是定语从句，修饰languages。
Example 7
真题回放：The group found that those elderly people who were able to retain a sense of independence were more likely to stay healthy in old age. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词found的宾语；该从句中又包含一个由who引导的定语从句，修饰elderly people。
Example 8

真题回放：For instance, a native corporation in Alaska, employing local people, is running an air tour from Anchorage to Kotzebue, where tourists eat Arctic food, walk on the tundra and watch local musicians and dancers. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。where引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰Kotzebue。
Example 9

真题回放：Scientists first recognised the value of the practice more than 60 years ago, when they found that rats fed a low-calorie diet lived longer on average than free-feeding rats and had a reduced incidence of conditions that become increasingly common in old age. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。when引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰more than 60 years ago；该从句中的第一个that引导的是宾语从句；该宾语从句中又包含一个由that引导的定语从句，修饰conditions。
Example 10
真题回放：A third reason why the writing of original science in English was delayed may have been to do with the linguistic inadequacy of English in the early modern period. （剑5阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。why引导的是定语从句，修饰a third reason。
（六）状语从句
Example 1
真题回放：Because IQ tests are decidedly influenced by what the child has learned, they are to some extent measures of current achievement based on age-norms. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。Because引导的是原因状语从句；该从句中又包含一个由what引导的宾语从句，作介词by的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：Studies at Harvard Business School show that, although some individuals may be more creative than others, almost every individual can be creative in the right circumstances. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作show的宾语，该从句中又包含一个由although引导的让步状语从句。
Example 3
真题回放：However far from reality such portrayals are, they capture the essential truth that archaeology is an exciting quest — the quest for knowledge about ourselves and our past. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。However引导的是让步状语从句，画线的部分是主句；that引导的是同位语从句，作truth的同位语。
Example 4

真题回放：While the detrimental effects of noise in classroom situations are not limited to children experiencing disability, those with a disability that affects their processing of speech and verbal communication could be extremely vulnerable. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。While引导的是让步状语从句，画线的部分是主句；that引导的是定语从句，修饰a disability。
Example 5
真题回放：The archaeologist has to develop a picture of the past, just as the scientist has to develop a coherent view of the natural world. （剑4阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，just as引导的是比较状语从句。
Example 6
真题回放：These periods became known as temporal hours because their duration varied according to the changing length of days and nights with the passing of the seasons. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，because引导的是原因状语从句。
Example 7
真题回放：You might think, therefore, that modern land tortoises have probably stayed on land ever since those early terrestrial times, as most mammals did after a few of them went back to the sea. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，该从句中又包含一个由as引导的方式状语从句，该状语从句中又包含一个由after引导的时间状语从句。
Example 8
真题回放：The effort to clean up cars may do little to cut pollution if nothing is done about the tendency to drive them more. （剑3阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，if引导的是条件状语从句。
Example 9

真题回放：Turning now to the heart of the study, in two divisions an attempt was made to change the supervision so that the decision levels were pushed down and detailed supervision of the workers reduced. （剑3阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。so that引导的是目的状语从句；该从句又是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 10

真题回放：By the mid-1960s, the situation took an alarming turn with the outbreak of four more new pests, necessitating pesticide spraying to such an extent that 50% of the financial outlay on cotton production was accounted for by pesticides. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，such…that引导的是结果状语从句。
二、雅思听力真题分析60例
（一）主语从句
Example 1
真题回放：But what he wanted to do was talk to the local people about their old stone carvings and then make one himself to learn more about the process. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，what引导的是主语从句。
Example 2
真题回放：There is great concern for their survival since it is estimated that less than two hundred of these white bears remain. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。since引导的是原因状语从句；该从句本身又是一个主从复合句，it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
Example 3
真题回放：It is widely known that Chinese and Japanese food contains MSG but many people don't seem to be aware that it is also used in foods in other parts of the world. （剑7听力）
语法破解：but前是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。but后也是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词aware的宾语。but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 4
真题回放：Now, what we finish with on the form is really a list from you of what your priorities are in choosing a hall and we'll do our best to take these into account. （剑9听力）
语法破解：and前是一个主从复合句，第一个what引导的是主语从句；第二个what引导的是宾语从句，作介词of的宾语。and后是一个简单句。and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 5
真题回放：It's hardly surprising that tourists flock to see the area. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。
Example 6
真题回放：This has been public land for hundreds of years, and what you'll find interesting is that the River Ouse, which flows into the sea eighty kilometres away, has its source in the common. （剑9听力）
语法破解：and前是一个简单句。and后是一个多重主从复合句，what引导的是主语从句；that引导的是表语从句，该从句中又包含一个由which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰the River Ouse。and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 7
真题回放：Yes, but what's important is that managers are able to deal with quite high levels of personal stress. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。what引导的是主语从句，that引导的是表语从句。
Example 8
真题回放：In fact, and it's possible that in future the house may even generate an electricity surplus, and that the owners will be able to sell some to the national grid. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。it是形式主语，两个that引导的都是主语从句；这两个主语从句由and连接，是同等关系。
Example 9
真题回放：What managers should be targeting is those employees who can take the lead in a situation and are not afraid to accept the idea of responsibility. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。What引导的是主语从句；who引导的是定语从句，修饰those employees。
Example 10
真题回放：It's a well known fact that men and women do lots of things in different ways, and the workplace is no different. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句；该主语从句又是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，and前后的句子是同等关系。
（二）宾语从句
Example 1
真题回放：I really believe that most scientists would welcome a way to guard against unethical uses of such technology. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词believe的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：In terms of production, this means that you only use what you need and so there wouldn't be any waste. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词means的宾语。在这个宾语从句中，so前面是一个主从复合句，what引导的是宾语从句，作动词use的宾语；so后面是一个简单句；so前后的句子是因果关系。
Example 3
真题回放：We're really pleased that after some years away teaching, Sarah has now returned to the park and makes sure the visitors are kept fed and watered, which keeps her pretty busy. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词pleased的宾语；该宾语从句本身又是一个主从复合句，画线的部分是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，作makes sure的宾语；which引导的是非限制性定语从句。
Example 4
真题回放：But you have to bear in mind that there is only one departure a day, so it depends what time your flight gets in. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作bear in mind的宾语。在这个宾语从句中，so前面是一个简单句；so后面是一个主从复合句，what引导的是宾语从句，作动词depends的宾语；so前后的句子是因果关系。
Example 5

真题回放：We're able to provide information about what scientists should take with them to the South Pole—for example, the centre contains a clothing warehouse where expeditions are supplied with suitable clothing for the extreme conditions. （剑7听力）
语法破解：破折号前面是一个主从复合句，what引导的是宾语从句，作介词about的宾语。破折号后面也是一个主从复合句，where引导的是定语从句，修饰a clothing warehouse。破折号前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 6
真题回放：Well, I'm happy to report that the power company have agreed to move the power lines underground at a cost of $ 800,000. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词report的宾语。
Example 7
真题回放：Today I am going to explore why it is so popular in these cuisines and, more importantly, how does it enhance the flavour of food. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。why和how引导的都是宾语从句，二者由and连接，是同等关系，都作动词explore的宾语。
Example 8
真题回放：Anyway, my current research involves trying to find a particular type of bee, the Asian Honey Bee, and finding out whether there are any of them around in various states of Australia. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。whether引导的是宾语从句，作finding out的宾语。
Example 9
真题回放：I think that will really improve the look of the area, as well as being safer. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。think后面是宾语从句；注意：该从句中的that是主语，而非引导词。
Example 10
真题回放：Hello, and thank you for asking me to your teachers' meeting to talk about the Dinosaur Museum and to tell you a bit about what you can do with your students there.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。what引导的是宾语从句，作介词about的宾语。
（三）表语从句
Example 1
真题回放：And another argument was that there was no tradition of large ship-building in the communities lying to the east of Polynesia. （剑10听力）
译 文：另一个观点是，在波利尼西亚东部群落没有大型船舶建造的传统。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。
Example 2
真题回放：Another influence is that concerns about the environment will force manufactures to extend product lifecycles, to reduce the amount of pollution and waste. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。
Example 3
真题回放：What struck me was that when people became more comfortable with me and less suspicious, we really connected with each other in a meaningful way. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。What引导的是主语从句；that引导的是表语从句，该从句中又包含一个由when引导的时间状语从句。
Example 4
真题回放：But the interesting thing about this bird is that we are able to analyse exactly what it eats and that's really helpful if we're looking for introduced insects. （剑8听力）
语法破解：and前是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句，该从句中又包含一个由what引导的宾语从句，作动词analyse的宾语；and后是一个主从复合句，if引导是条件状语从句；and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 5
真题回放：France is where we have the majority of sites, and we currently have a project to expand into Switzerland. （剑7听力）
语法破解：and前是一个主从复合句，where引导的是表语从句；and后是一个简单句；and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 6
真题回放：Another characteristic is that communication usually takes the form of conversations rather than, say, formal meetings or written memos. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。
Example 7
真题回放：Well yes, the teachers agree that it is a very valuable resource but one thing we have noticed is that a lot of the students are using it to check their personal emails. （剑9听力）
语法破解：but前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作动词agree的宾语。but后也是一个主从复合句，we have noticed是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰one thing；that引导的是表语从句。but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 8
真题回放：It sounds as if it was a real challenge. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。sounds是半系动词，as if引导的是表语从句。
Example 9
真题回放：Matthews found that it was best to be mixed-handed—this is because a hockey stick must be deployed in two directions—it would be a drawback to have hand or eye favouring one side. （剑7听力）
语法破解：第一个破折号前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作动词found的宾语；两个破折号之间也是一个主从复合句，because引导的是表语从句；第二个破折号后是一个简单句。
Example 10
真题回放：The only slight problems with this cot were that it had no brakes, but they didn't think that mattered too much. （剑5听力）
语法破解：but前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句；but后也是一个主从复合句，think后面是宾语从句；but前后的句子是转折关系。
（四）同位语从句
Example 1

真题回放：All these influences have a negative impact on the spirit bear's very existence, which is made all the more fragile by the fact that reproduction among these bears has always been disappointingly low. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。which引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰前面的整个句子；该从句中又包含一个由that引导的同位语从句，作fact的同位语。
Example 2
真题回放：There's no doubt that nanotechnology promises so much for civilisation. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作no doubt的同位语。
Example 3
真题回放：And the situation's complicated even further by the fact that experts are usually not aware of their own ignorance. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语。
Example 4
真题回放：The Yam style of painting got its name from the fact that it featured much curvier figures that actually resemble the vegetable called a yam, which is similar to a sweet potato. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。第一个that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语；该同位语从句本身又是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是定语从句，修饰figures；该定语从句中又包含一个由which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰a yam。
Example 5
真题回放：And then the fact that it's been home to native American Navajos and all the social history that goes with that. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。主句是省略句，（根据原文上下文）主句补充完整之后就是And then I thought from the fact；that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语；该从句中又包含一个由that引导的定语从句，修饰history。
Example 6
真题回放：Our testers liked the fact that it had four wheels, so it was easy to move around. （剑5听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语；该同位语从句又是由so连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，so前后的句子是因果关系。
Example 7
真题回放：On the minus side, our testers did not like the fact that the side of the cot did not drop down, making it difficult to pick up newborn babies. （剑5听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语。
Example 8

真题回放：The negatives for this one were quite minor; the only niggle everyone had was the fact that it has no wheels and the only other problem anyone could find, was that there were pictures which were simply stuck on and so could easily become detached. （剑5听力）

语法破解：分号前是一个简单句。在分号后的句子中，and前是一个主从复合句，画线的部分是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰the only niggle, that引导的是同位语从句，作fact的同位语；and后是一个多重主从复合句，画线的部分是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰the only other problem, that引导的是表语从句，该从句中又包含一个由which引导的定语从句，修饰pictures；and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 9
真题回放：For instance, there are considerable archaeological difficulties about the theory that they came from England. （剑6听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作theory的同位语。
Example 10
真题回放：But there are even greater practical problems about the theory that they came directly from continental Europe. （剑6听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是同位语从句，作theory的同位语。
（五）定语从句
Example 1

真题回放：Typical examples that will attract and retain staff are traditional ones like flexible hours and—something that has been made possible by advances in technology—remote working, with people based at their home, abroad, or almost anywhere they choose. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。第一个that引导的是定语从句，修饰examples；第二个that引导的也是定语从句，修饰something，这里的something指的是remote working；they choose是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰anywhere。
Example 2
真题回放：For instance, tiny airborne nano-robots could be programmed to actually rebuild the ozone layer, which could lessen the impact of global warming on our planet. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。which引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰前面的整个句子。
Example 3
真题回放：In addition, they have built roads which have fractured the areas where the bear usually feeds, and many hibernation sites have also been lost. （剑10听力）
语法破解：and前是一个多重主从复合句，which引导的是定语从句，修饰roads；该定语从句中又包含一个由where引导的定语从句，修饰the areas。and后是一个简单句。and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 4
真题回放：I'd visualise what he must have been like in the past, when he was sitting in his consulting room listening to his patients. （剑10听力）
译 文：我想象他过去一定是这样的，他坐在诊室里，倾听着他的病人讲话。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。what引导的是宾语从句，作动词visualise 的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含一个由when引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰the past。
Example 5
真题回放：Every night I read for hours, using the lists of references that were given, and I made pages of notes. （剑9听力）
语法破解：and前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是定语从句，修饰references；and后是一个简单句；and前后的句子是同等关系。
Example 6
真题回放：Unfortunately, this type of event is a frequent occurrence in some of the locations that you'll be travelling to, where sometimes the tide goes out suddenly, confusing the animals. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是定语从句，修饰some of the locations；where引导的是非限制性定语从句，也修饰some of the locations。
Example 7
真题回放：The other alternative is to opt for a single bedsit which actually has more space and better facilities. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。which引导的是定语从句，修饰a single bedsit。
Example 8
真题回放：And one way in which this information can be published is in the form of maps. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，in which引导的是定语从句，修饰one way。
Example 9
真题回放：The main reason why MSG is more commonly used in Japanese meals is tradition. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。why引导的是定语从句，修饰reason。
Example 10
真题回放：In regard to opening hours, we're open every day of the week from 9. 00 am to 8. 00 pm except on Mondays when we close at 1.30 pm. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。when引导的是定语从句，修饰Mondays。
（六）状语从句
Example 1
真题回放：You don't have to have any special clothes or equipment when you visit the club. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，when引导的是时间状语从句。
Example 2
真题回放：We provide robes and hairdryers in the changing rooms, but it's very important to remember your photo card because you won't be able to get in without it. （剑10听力）
语法破解：but前是一个简单句；but后是一个主从复合句，because引导的是原因状语从句；but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 3
真题回放：While it is important to maintain the spirit bear's habitat, there also needs to be more emphasis on its expansion. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。While引导的是让步状语从句。
Example 4
真题回放：John Prescott, an associate professor at the University of Chicago, suggests that this fifth taste serves a purpose just as the other tastes do. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作suggests的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含一个由just as引导的比较状语从句。
Example 5
真题回放：Although it's cold and snowy there in the winter, the earth is baked so hard in the summer sun that rainwater can't penetrate. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Although引导的是让步状语从句，so…that引导的是结果状语从句。
Example 6
真题回放：Hello, I'm delighted to welcome you to our Wildlife Club, and very pleased that you're interested in the countryside and the plants and creatures of this area. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词pleased的宾语。
Example 7

真题回放：There are excellent washing facilities at all our sites, with washing machines and clothes lines in the central areas, along with mops and buckets in case your tent needs cleaning during your stay. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，in case引导的是目的状语从句。
Example 8
真题回放：You usually find it where the market for the company's product is extremely competitive, or where the products themselves have a short life-span.
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。两个where引导的都是地点状语从句，二者由or连接，是选择关系。
Example 9

真题回放：I began to develop larger-scale models of locomotives but we didn't think anything more of it until I went on a trip to a theme park near Birmingham and decided we could do a much better job! （剑9听力）
语法破解：but前是一个简单句；but后是一个多重主从复合句，until引导的是时间状语从句，该从句中的we could do a much better job是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，作动词decided的宾语；but前后的句子是转折关系。
Example 10

真题回放：And finally, if you need to prove you're healthy or haven't had any serious injuries before a new employer will accept you, you can get a free fitness check-up there, but you'd most likely have to pay for insurance medicals though. （剑9听力）

语法破解：but前是一个多重主从复合句，画线的部分是主句，if引导的是条件状语从句；该条件状语从句本身又是一个主从复合句，you need to prove是主句，you're healthy or haven't had any serious injuries是省略了引导词that的宾语从句，作动词prove的宾语，before引导的是时间状语从句。but后是一个简单句。but前后的句子是转折关系。
三、雅思写作和口语中的主从复合句
在雅思写作和口语中，除了使用简单句和并列句之外，还要能够用好主从复合句。
下面我们就举例讲解主从复合句的具体应用。
（一）主语从句
点评：这是一个主从复合句。It是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“工作类和政府类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句，it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。Who引导的是主语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“环境类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。Whether引导的是主语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“交通类和环境类”话题中。
（二）宾语从句
点评：这是一个主从复合句，why引导的是宾语从句，作动词explore的宾语。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类和工作类”话题中。
点评：but前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作动词think的宾语；but后是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作动词believe的宾语，该宾语从句中又包含一个由because引导的原因状语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“旅游类和媒体类”话题中。
点评：and前是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作形容词glad的宾语；and后是一个简单句；and前后的句子是同等关系。该句常用于写作的“书信类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是宾语从句，作介词of的宾语。该句常用于在写作和口语中对两种方法进行分析或比较。
（三）表语从句
点评：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类和工作类”话题中。

点评：这是一个多重主从复合句，that引导的是表语从句，该从句中又包含一个由which引导的非限制性定语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类和留学类”话题中。
（四）同位语从句

（五）定语从句
点评：这是一个主从复合句，who引导的是定语从句，修饰people。该句常用于写作中，表示引出另一方的不同观点。

点评：这是一个主从复合句，why引导的是定语从句，修饰The main reason；that引导的是表语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“经济类和科技类”话题中。
点评：and前是一个简单句；and后是一个主从复合句，where引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰a gym；and前后的句子是同等关系。该句常用于口语的“休闲类和体育类”话题中。
（六）状语从句

点评：分号前是一个多重主从复合句。When引导的是时间状语从句，该从句中又包含一个由which引导的定语从句，修饰a language。分号后是一个主从复合句，when引导的是时间状语从句。该句常用于写作、口语的“语言类和文化类”话题中。
